Activity: Log in to the EHR system, review patient records for the day. Prioritize patients with flu-like symptoms for data entry.
Accurately enter patient data into the EHR, focusing on symptoms and vaccination status. Cross-check with @mrs-1 and @mrs-2 for any discrepancies.
Take a short break, browse healthcare news for updates on seasonal influenza trends.
Resume data entry, ensuring all patient information is up-to-date and correctly logged.
Participate in training session on new EHR functionalities for influenza tracking with @trainer-1 and @ehrv-1.
Practice using new EHR functionalities with mock patient data. Discuss any issues with @ehrdev-1 and @ehrdev-2.
Wrap up data entry for the day, ensure all records are saved and backed up.
